SELECT pro.name, i.sort as i_sort,i.model i_model, i.name as i_name,i.unit as i_unit,i.number as i_number,i.finally_price as i_finally_price,i.price as i_price,i.params as i_params,i.id as i_id, i.correct_price as i_correct_price,i.item_id as i_item_id, i.template_id as i_template_id, j.name as i_parent_id, q.supplier as q_supplier,q.id as q_id,q.su_brand as q_su_brand,q.su_params as q_su_params,q.su_price as q_su_price,q.su_total_price as q_su_total_price, q.su_delivery as q_su_delivery,q.warranty as q_warranty,q.su_remark q_su_remark,q.su_model q_su_model from sys_pro_detail pro LEFT JOIN inquiry i on pro.id = i.pro_detail_id LEFT JOIN quote q on i.id = q.inquiry_id LEFT JOIN sys_pro_check c on q.id = c.quote_id LEFT JOIN inquiry j on i.parent_id = j.id
pro.is_active = 1 AND i.is_active = 1 AND q.is_active = 1 AND c.finally_audit = 1
and pro.id = #{proDetailId}
order by i.sort
